p: The keywords in the COVID-19 antiviral therapy section were the only keywords associated with COVID-19. Since a small number of articles were published about the treatment, and the use of antiviral treatments were prevalently not mentioned in the abstracts of the articles, keywords related to “antiviral therapy” were not included in the search. Also, the search date was chosen to be from early 2019 until March 15, 2020, since the first report of COVID-19 was published in late 2019.
